text: IRry 7244 TTAf nfearru 7H4 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sv @ar- a1k_{THTT +q4) 487 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vi-5 & 6, #qer-10, ERqT, 7 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines Consultancy Policy Circular No. 10.2.30/2021 dated 04th October , 2021 (Decision taken File No: NHAI/11018/01/2008-PQ-Part(4) Computer No: 54149) Sub: Engagement of Financial Consultants for Evaluation of Bids of supervision Consultant (SC)Authority Engineer (AE)/Independent Engineer (IE) and other assignments of Technical Consultants for NHAI's Projects Revision in fee reg: With regard to the Policy Circular No.10.2.29 dated 23.04.2021 regarding Engagement of Financial Consultants for Evaluation of Bids of Consultancy services, it is hereby clarified that the revised fees may be read as Rs.9500 + taxes as applicable in lieu of Rs.9500/- 2_ Rest all terms and conditions of the original   Policy  Circular will remain unchanged. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: iolwli (S.K. Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All officers of NHAI HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices. to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 2.
